mapper.select: SELECT VRIABL_ID, VRIABL_NM, VRIABL_UNIT_NM, BASS_VALUE, VRIABL_DC, VRIABL_VALUE, QC_VRIABL_VALUE, MARK_CPHR, RDMS_CNTC_AT, DATA_CHANGE_AT, LAS_CNTC_AT, LAS_REGIST_AT, RDMS_DOC_NO FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_VRIABL WHERE REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND EXPR_ODR = #{exprOdr} AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT SET CALC_LAW_SEQNO = #{calcLawSeqno}, NOMFRM_NM = #{nomfrmNm}, NOMFRM_CN = #{nomfrmCn}, RVSOP_CN = #{rvsopCn}, RESULT_VALUE = #{resultValue}, MARK_VALUE = #{resultValue}, MARK_CPHR = #{markCphr}, RESULT_REGISTER_ID = CASE WHEN (RDMS_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL OR LAS_REGIST_AT = 'Y') THEN RESULT_REGISTER_ID ELSE TO_NUMBER('${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}') END, RESULT_REGIST_DTE = CASE WHEN (RDMS_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL OR LAS_REGIST_AT = 'Y') THEN RESULT_REGIST_DTE ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resultRegistDte}), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) END, JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = #{jdgmntWordCode}, VRIABL_ID = #{vriablId}, QC_RESULT_VALUE = #{resultValue}, QC_MARK_VALUE = #{resultValue}, QC_RESULT_REGIST_DTE = CASE WHEN (RDMS_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL OR LAS_REGIST_AT = 'Y') THEN RESULT_REGIST_DTE ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resultRegistDte}), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) END, QC_RESULT_REGISTER_ID = CASE WHEN (RDMS_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL OR LAS_REGIST_AT = 'Y') THEN QC_RESULT_REGISTER_ID ELSE TO_NUMBER('${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}') END, RVSOP_CPHR_RANDOM_CREAT_AT = NVL(#{rvsopCphrRandomCreatAt},'N'), LAST_CHANGER_ID = CASE WHEN (RDMS_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL OR LAS_REGIST_AT = 'Y') THEN LAST_CHANGER_ID ELSE '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' END, LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND EXPR_ODR = #{exprOdr} AND DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT PROGRS_SITTN_CODE FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE WHERE IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
UPDATE IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE SET
JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = (SELECT CASE WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE2 > 0 THEN 'IM05000002' WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE1 > 0 THEN 'IM05000001' WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE3 > 0 THEN 'IM05000003' END FROM (SELECT NVL (SUM (CASE WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = 'IM05000001' THEN '1' END),0) JDGMNT_WORD_CODE1, NVL (SUM (CASE WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = 'IM05000002' THEN '1' END),0) JDGMNT_WORD_CODE2, NVL (SUM (CASE WHEN JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = 'IM05000003' THEN '1' END),0) JDGMNT_WORD_CODE3 FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT WHERE REQEST_eXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND EXPR_ODR = #{exprOdr} AND DELETE_AT = 'N') ), IRE.LAST_RESULT_REGISTER_ID = TO_NUMBER('${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}'), IRE.LAST_RESULT_REGIST_DTE = NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resultRegistDte}), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')), IRE.LAST_QC_RESULT_REGISTER_ID = TO_NUMBER('${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}'), IRE.LAST_QC_RESULT_REGIST_DTE = NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resultRegistDte}), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')), IRE.UNIT_SEQNO = #{unitSeqno}, IRE.EQPMN_SEQNO = #{eqpmnSeqno} WHERE IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_VRIABL IREV USING DUAL DUAL ON (IREV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND IREV.EXPR_ODR = #{exprOdr} AND IREV.VRIABL_ID = #{vriablId} AND IREV.DELETE_AT = 'N') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET IREV.VRIABL_VALUE = #{vriablValue}, IREV.QC_VRIABL_VALUE = NVL(QC_VRIABL_VALUE, NVL(#{vriablValue}, #{qcVriablValue})), IREV.LAST_CHANGER_ID = '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}', IREV.LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( IREV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, IREV.EXPR_ODR, IREV.BPLC_CODE, IREV.VRIABL_ID, IREV.VRIABL_NM, IREV.VRIABL_UNIT_NM, IREV.BASS_VALUE, IREV.VRIABL_DC, IREV.MARK_CPHR, IREV.RDMS_CNTC_AT, IREV.LAS_CNTC_AT, IREV.DATA_CHANGE_AT, IREV.VRIABL_VALUE, IREV.QC_VRIABL_VALUE, IREV.LAST_CHANGER_ID, IREV.LAST_CHANGE_DT )VALUES( #{reqestExpriemSeqno}, #{exprOdr}, , #{vriablId}, #{vriablNm}, #{vriablUnitNm}, #{bassValue}, #{vriablDc}, #{markCphr}, #{rdmsCntcAt}, #{lasCntcAt}, #{dataChangeAt}, #{vriablValue}, NVL(#{vriablValue},#{qcVriablValue}), '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}', SYSDATE
)
mapper.select: SELECT PROGRS_SITTN_CODE FROM IM_REQEST WHERE 1=1 AND REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SQ_RS_NCR.NEXTVAL ncrSeqno FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RS_NCR( NCR_SEQNO ,BPLC_CODE ,CHRG_DEPT_CODE ,REQEST_SEQNO ,PRDUCT_NM ,OCCRRNC_DTE ,LAST_CHANGER_ID ,LAST_CHANGE_DT ) SELECT #{ncrSeqno} , , IR.REQEST_DEPT_CODE , IR.REQEST_SEQNO , SM.MTRIL_NM , SYSDATE , '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , SYSDATE FROM IM_REQEST IR JOIN SY_MTRIL SM ON IR.MTRIL_SEQNO = SM.MTRIL_sEQNO LEFT JOIN SY_ENTRPS SE ON SE.ENTRPS_SEQNO = IR.ENTRPS_SEQNO AND SE.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SE.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE IR.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND IR.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SM.USE_AT = 'Y' AND SM.DELETE_AT = 'N'

INSERT INTO RS_NCR_EXPRIEM ( NCR_SEQNO , ORDR , BPLC_CODE , REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO , EXPR_ODR , LAST_CHANGER_ID , LAST_CHANGE_DT )VALUES( #{ncrSeqno} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(ORDR),0)+1 FROM RS_NCR_EXPRIEM WHERE NCR_SEQNO = #{ncrSeqno}) , , #{reqestExpriemSeqno} , #{exprOdr} , '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE IM_REQEST IR SET IR.PROGRS_SITTN_cODE = 'IM03000003' , IR.REREQEST_NUM = (NVL(IR.REREQEST_NUM,0)+1) , IR.LOCK_AT = 'N' , ROA_CREAT_AT = 'N' , LAST_CHANGER_ID = '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND IR.DELETE_AT = 'N'

UPDATE IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE SET IRE.LAST_EXPR_ODR = (SELECT NVL(IIRE.REREQEST_NUM,0) FROM IM_REQEST IIRE WHERE IIRE.REQEST_SEQNO = IRE.REQEST_SEQNO AND IIRE.DELETE_AT = 'N') , IRE.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = 'IM03000003' , LAST_CHANGER_ID = '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT( REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, EXPR_ODR, BPLC_CODE, CALC_LAW_SEQNO, NOMFRM_NM, NOMFRM_CN, RVSOP_CN, VRIABL_ID, RESULT_VALUE, MARK_VALUE, RESULT_REGISTER_ID, RESULT_REGIST_DTE, QC_RESULT_VALUE, QC_MARK_VALUE, MARK_CPHR, QC_RESULT_REGISTER_ID, QC_RESULT_REGIST_DTE, JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, RDMS_UUID, RDMS_DOC_NO, UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, LAS_REGIST_AT, LAS_CN, REAL_ANALS_AT, REAL_ANALS_DT, ORGINL_RDMS_DOC_NO, ORGINL_UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, LAST_RESULT_INPUT_AT, DELETE_AT, LAST_CHANGER_ID, LAST_CHANGE_DT, RVSOP_CPHR_RANDOM_CREAT_AT, RDMS_REGIST_AT ) SELECT IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, IRE.LAST_EXPR_ODR, IRER.BPLC_CODE, IRER.CALC_LAW_SEQNO, IRER.NOMFRM_NM, IRER.NOMFRM_CN, IRER.RVSOP_CN, IRER.VRIABL_ID, IRER.RESULT_VALUE, IRER.MARK_VALUE, IRER.RESULT_REGISTER_ID, IRER.RESULT_REGIST_DTE, IRER.QC_RESULT_VALUE, IRER.QC_MARK_VALUE, IRER.MARK_CPHR, IRER.QC_RESULT_REGISTER_ID, IRER.QC_RESULT_REGIST_DTE, IRER.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, IRER.RDMS_UUID, IRER.RDMS_DOC_NO, IRER.UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRER.LAS_REGIST_AT, IRER.LAS_CN, IRER.REAL_ANALS_AT, IRER.REAL_ANALS_DT, IRER.ORGINL_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRER.ORGINL_UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRER.LAST_RESULT_INPUT_AT, IRER.DELETE_AT, '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}', SYSDATE, IRER.RVSOP_CPHR_RANDOM_CREAT_AT, IRER.RDMS_REGIST_AT FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT IRER JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE ON IRER.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND IRER.EXPR_ODR = (SELECT MAX(EXPR_ODR) FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT IA WHERE IA.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = IRER.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND IA.DELETE_AT = 'N') WHERE IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N'

INSERT INTO IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_VRIABL( REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, EXPR_ODR, BPLC_CODE, VRIABL_ID, VRIABL_NM, VRIABL_UNIT_NM, BASS_VALUE, VRIABL_DC, MARK_CPHR, RDMS_CNTC_AT, LAS_CNTC_AT, VRIABL_VALUE, QC_VRIABL_VALUE, LAS_REGIST_AT, LAS_CN, REAL_ANALS_AT, REAL_ANALS_DT,
RDMS_UUID, RDMS_DOC_NO, UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, ORGINL_RDMS_DOC_NO, ORGINL_UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, DATA_CHANGE_AT, DELETE_AT, LAST_CHANGER_ID, LAST_CHANGE_DT ) SELECT IRERV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, IRE.LAST_EXPR_ODR, , IRERV.VRIABL_ID, IRERV.VRIABL_NM, IRERV.VRIABL_UNIT_NM, IRERV.BASS_VALUE, IRERV.VRIABL_DC, IRERV.MARK_CPHR, IRERV.RDMS_CNTC_AT, IRERV.LAS_CNTC_AT, IRERV.VRIABL_VALUE, IRERV.QC_VRIABL_VALUE, IRERV.LAS_REGIST_AT, IRERV.LAS_CN, IRERV.REAL_ANALS_AT, IRERV.REAL_ANALS_DT,
IRERV.RDMS_UUID, IRERV.RDMS_DOC_NO, IRERV.UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRERV.ORGINL_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRERV.ORGINL_UPDT_RDMS_DOC_NO, IRERV.DATA_CHANGE_AT, IRERV.DELETE_AT, '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}', SYSDATE FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_VRIABL IRERV JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE ON IRERV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND IRERV.EXPR_ODR = (SELECT MAX(EXPR_ODR) FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_VRIABL IA WHERE IA.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = IRERV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND IA.DELETE_AT = 'N') WHERE IRERV.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = #{reqestExpriemSeqno} AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT SQ_CM_WDTB.NEXTVAL wdtbSeqno FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CM_WDTB( WDTB_SEQNO , WDTB_PREARNGE_DT , WDTB_POSBL_AT , LAST_CHANGER_ID , LAST_CHANGE_DT ) VALUES( #{wdtbSeqno} , SYSDATE , 'Y' , '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO CM_WDTB_TRGTER( WDTB_SEQNO , ORDR , USER_ID , EMAIL_TRNSMIS_AT , CHRCTR_TRNSMIS_AT , LAST_CHANGER_ID , LAST_CHANGE_DT ) SELECT #{wdtbSeqno} , ROWNUM , USER_ID , EMAIL_RECPTN_AT , CHRCTR_RECPTN_AT , '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}' , SYSDATE FROM IM_REQEST IR JOIN SY_MTRIL_NTCN_USER SMNU ON IR.MTRIL_SEQNO = SMNU.MTRIL_SEQNO WHERE IR.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND IR.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SMNU.DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND SMNU.ALL_RECPTN_AT = 'Y'
AND SMNU.DSQLFC_RECPTN_AT = 'Y' AND SMNU.ALL_RECPTN_AT = 'N'
AND SMNU.PSEXAM_RECPTN_AT = 'Y' AND SMNU.ALL_RECPTN_AT = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , EMAIL_RECPTN_AT , CHRCTR_RECPTN_AT , PSEXAM_RECPTN_AT , DSQLFC_RECPTN_AT , ALL_RECPTN_AT FROM IM_REQEST IR JOIN SY_MTRIL_NTCN_USER SMNU ON IR.MTRIL_SEQNO = SMNU.MTRIL_SEQNO WHERE IR.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND IR.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SMNU.DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.update:
BEGIN UPDATE IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM A SET A.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = 'IM03000004', A.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000002',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000002' WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000001',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000001' WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000003',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000003' END FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT IRE WHERE IRE.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = A.REQEST_EXPRIEM_sEQNO AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND IRE.EXPR_ODR = A.LAST_EXPR_ODR ) WHERE A.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND A.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = 'IM03000003' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N';
UPDATE IM_REQEST A SET A.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = (SELECT MIN(IA.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE) FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IA WHERE IA.REQEST_SEQNO = A.REQEST_SEQNO AND IA.DELETE_AT = 'N' ), A.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000002',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000002' WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000001',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000001' WHEN SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000003',1)) > 0 THEN 'IM05000003' END FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE WHERE IRE.REQEST_SEQNO = A.REQEST_sEQNO AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) WHERE A.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND A.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = 'IM03000003'; END;

UPDATE IM_REQEST A SET A.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = ( SELECT DECODE( SUM(DECODE(IRE.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE, 'IM05000002', 1,0)) , '0' , '' , 'IM05000002' ) FROM IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM IRE WHERE IRE.REQEST_SEQNO = A.REQEST_sEQNO AND IRE.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) WHERE A.REQEST_SEQNO = #{reqestSeqno} AND A.PROGRS_SITTN_CODE = 'IM03000003'
